scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @goeducate/api" "npm run dev -w @goeducate/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @goeducate/shared && npm run build -w @goeducate/api && npm run build -w @goeducate/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @goeducate/shared && npm run lint -w @goeducate/api && npm run lint -w @goeducate/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @goeducate/shared && npm run typecheck -w @goeducate/api && npm run typecheck -w @goeducate/web
